ComicInfo.Title: Reunion, Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary: Reunion, Part 1: In the past, Vila offers her daughter Gaila to become the wife of a Pacari leader to complete a negotiation. Kazek intervenes and rescues Gaila, and flees with her and Kai to seek refuge on Earth. Later Kai and Gaila decide to attend Starfleet Academy. In the present, Gaila's ship, the USS Tereshkova, meets up with the enterprise and Gaila and Kai are reunited. When the ships answer a distress call, it turns out to be a trap set by the Orions, who kidnap Kai and Gaila and reunite them with their mother.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-30 23:36:52. [CVDB510977] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:14:11. [Issue ID 1523670]

Nyota Uhura,Jerath of Vondem (Orion),Vila (Orion leader of Hexis-Kyse family, mother of Gaila and Kai),Kazek (husband of Vila, father of Gaila and Kai),Lt. Commander Spock
